activities:
Individuals, including those located in the EU, who use our website (“Site”) or our Preparis ACTION PlatformSM (“Service”) may not be able to use some of the features we offer on our Site or through our Service unless the person is registered to use our Site and/or our Service. To register, individuals are required to provide their name, address, phone number, job title, company, email address, screen name and a password. 
For example, this personally identifiable information is required if an individual wants to download software or submit a request for a Preparis representative to contact them. In some cases, an employer may provide us with the personally identifiable information of their employees so that their employees can access our Service. 
Registration information is used to provide and otherwise administer the services and/or products individuals request. We may also use the personally identifiable information we receive to help us understand our customers and to tailor and enhance our product and service offerings.
Please see our Privacy Policy for additional information.
